'''13w25c''' is the seventeenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 20, 2013<ref>{{tweet|dinner|347737308436525057}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w25a]] and [[13w25b]] snapshots.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w25c|prefix=Snapshot
|;old
|188|''doFiretick'' makes [[fire]] to not extinguish.
|607|Running at a high resolution causes large portions of the screen to be unclickable.
|4266|Death counter does not update.
|13559|Pick block from [[inventory]] in [[creative]] doesn't preserve size of stacks.
|16075|Entities other than the player can't leave [[the End]].
|;dev
|13745|Tamed [[wolves]]/[[cat]]s teleporting when [[leashed]] to a [[fence]].
|16861|[[Enchantment]]s on a [[mob]]'s [[weapon]] does not affect other mobs.
|17537|Other [[player]]s cats can be tied to a lead and dragged away.
|17849|Resource packs not converting correctly.
|17856|Unable to load resource pack with missing directory-ZipEntries.
|17864|[[Credits]] end too fast.
|18158|Messed up textures of some items.
|;previous
|18468|Turning on sound after previously not hearing it crashes the game.
}}</onlyinclude>
